Method.name: AddToCconsoleLog
Method.Implementation: set message = ..GenerateRandomString($Random(10)+1) set severity = $Random(2)+1 do ##class(%SYS.System).WriteToConsoleLog(message,"0",severity) quit "Message added: "_message

set obj = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New()
set obj.Name="abd" set obj.SurName="xyz" set propName=$o(obj.%data("")) while propName'="" { set propName=$o(obj.%data(propName)) }
